overview: Maddy Black is fresh out of a break-up and there’s only one way to cure the heartbreak… an anal threesome! That’s right, Marie Berger and Joss Lescaff know the perfect way to cheer Maddy up, but Joss’s BBC isn’t only good for curing heartbreak, it’s also a great aid for Lola Heart who fucks away a bad day by having a threesome with Joss and Amy Douxxx! Along with them, Megan Fiore and Angel Rivas also work up a sweat at the gym with the healthiest exercise they know, an anal threesome, and Angie Lynx and Sara Diamante indulge themselves by sharing a boyfriend!
title: Anal Threesomes 3
